feed.title: Changrui Mu
feed.subtitle: Hi, I'm Changrui! Some chase the unknown in the cosmos, my dream is to chase the intricate enigmas nestled within the realm of cryptography and computation. Straddling the edge of what can be believed, known, proved, and solved, I navigate the intricate boundaries between the computable and the inexpressible â€” the limitations set by the very fabric of our existence.
